/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the urban lifestyle of the city's inhabitants. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street scene.
